long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever forget about checking your to-do list and missing out on deadlines and other events? Task Alerts To-Do List will make sure this never happens again! Using the Chrome alarms API and Chrome notification API, notifications are sent to remind users about their plans, fighting against procrastination and creating a timeline that suits you. Change the primary color and secondary color of the extension in a way that satisfies your tastes! Stay tuned for aesthetic updates.
